trans-unit.source: Represents the change to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> for dynamic updates.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class can be used by a tracking service to determine which RuleSets have been changed during a dynamic update.
An instance of this object will be generated for every RuleSet that existed before the dynamic update and remains afterwards, and has changes applied to one or more rules.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction"></xref> class by using the original and the updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> classes.
The original <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
The updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
The RuleSetDefinition or updatedRuleSetDefinition is null
The names of the two RuleSets are not the same
Gets or sets the original <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
This property is settable so that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction> class can be deserialized.
There should be no need to set this property.
Changing it during a dynamic update might lead to unexpected results.
The original <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
The original <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
Gets or sets the updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
This property is settable so that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.UpdatedRuleSetAction> class can be deserialized.
There should be no need to set this property.
Changing it during a dynamic update might lead to unexpected results.
The updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref>.
The updated <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
